question: Which of the following best describes a membrane in the context of separation processes?
options: A thick barrier that prevents all transport between two phases
A selective barrier that permits the separation of certain species based on sieving or sorption-diffusion
A completely permeable layer that mixes two phases homogeneously
A solid block used to increase pressure in a system
answer: A selective barrier that permits the separation of certain species based on sieving or sorption-diffusion
